message: Happy New Year! Some sweet enhancements are coming to Tweeten today:
new: Syncing: Tweeten now syncs your theme, font, and some other settings across devices and TweetDeck without you needing to do anything. It's that simple.
Filters: Your TweetDeck/Twitter filters now automatically sync on Tweeten, which means your TweetDeck filters will no longer get destroyed as you start using Tweeten. EXTREMELY sorry about that!
fixes: GIF previews are no longer huge, so you can now actually close them. Plus, hitting the Esc key now automatically closes the preview.
Fixed an issue where the new loading screen would be stuck for some users.
Fixed an issue which prevented Windows 10 users from closing media previews using the close icon.
